pages.text: Has two modes, Magnet and Repel mode, and works from the hotbar, offhand, or trinket slots.

Magnet mode will pull in items when enabled (toggled with either the magnet mode keybind or when right clicked in hand).$(br2)Repel mode will repel away projectiles at the cost of mana (toggled with either the aux key plus the magnet mode keybind or by shift+right clicked in hand).
$(o)Waht will I do without my $(l)Ggravitational pull
